entry.title: Re @TimRunsHisMouth I’m fine with Trump not tweeting. The important thing is that Twitter correct a grave mistake in banning his account, despite no ...
entry.summary: Re @TimRunsHisMouth I’m fine with Trump not tweeting. The important thing is that Twitter correct a grave mistake in banning his account, despite no violation of the law or terms of service. Deplatforming a sitting President undermined public trust in Twitter for half of America.

entry.title: Re @Esqueer_ Incitement to violence will result in account suspension. Currently suspended accounts will be enabled slowly next week after manual revi...
entry.summary: Re @Esqueer_ Incitement to violence will result in account suspension. Currently suspended accounts will be enabled slowly next week after manual review to determine whether they have potentially broken the law or engaged in spam. Twitter will be a forum for the peaceful exchange of views.

entry.title: Re @saylor @Cryptoking @RBReich Deliberate impersonation/deception will result in account suspension. Organizational affiliation, bio and follower cou...
entry.summary: Re @saylor @Cryptoking @RBReich Deliberate impersonation/deception will result in account suspension. Organizational affiliation, bio and follower count distinguish between people who genuinely have the exact same name. We shall see how it goes.

entry.title: Re @getpaidwrite I am neither conventionally right nor left, but I agree with your point. The woke mind virus has thoroughly penetrated entertainment ...
entry.summary: Re @getpaidwrite I am neither conventionally right nor left, but I agree with your point. The woke mind virus has thoroughly penetrated entertainment and is pushing civilization towards suicide. There needs to be a counter-narrative.

entry.title: Re @Cryptoking @RBReich All verified individual humans will have same blue check, as boundary of what constitutes “notable” is otherwise too subject...
entry.summary: Re @Cryptoking @RBReich All verified individual humans will have same blue check, as boundary of what constitutes “notable” is otherwise too subjective. Individuals can have secondary tiny logo showing they belong to an org if verified as such by that org. Longer explanation next week.

entry.title: Re @Cryptoking @RBReich Sorry for the delay, we’re tentatively launching Verified on Friday next week. Gold check for companies, grey check for gover...
entry.summary: Re @Cryptoking @RBReich Sorry for the delay, we’re tentatively launching Verified on Friday next week. Gold check for companies, grey check for government, blue for individuals (celebrity or not) and all verified accounts will be manually authenticated before check activates. Painful, but necessary.
